objectif.title: Objective
objectif.text: Summer internship (3 and a half months) in databases and back-end development.

elements.school_name: INSA (National Institut of Applied Sciences, 4th year) at Lyon.
list: Software Development, AGIL projects, Data Base Management System...
Numerous group projects using Git in C++, Java, SQL...

elements.school_name: IUT Robert Schuman (University Institute of Technology).
list: Erasmus semester at the Via University, Horsens, Denmark.
Creation of the registration page (Angular framework) to make the registration easier for a teenager's association.
Creation of web-slides (HTML/CSS/JS) for a big pharmaceutical company (Biogaran).
Creation of pages for the Axopen website in PHP/HTML/CSS (Wordpress) to gain more visibility.
One month summer job for the cleaning service.
One month temporary job for a manutention service.

elements.text: Personal cloud project - Creation of my own cloud.
list: Hosted on a Raspberry Pi, 500Go storage capacity.
Creation of algorithm contests e.g. Le Shaker (1000 participants, national).

elements.text: Academic project: Video Game search engine on DBPedia using SPARQL and VueJS (team of 6).
Score manager of the annual theque competition (French baseball, 400 young participants).
SQL, Python, Java, C++, GIT, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Materialize (CSS), Bootstrap (CSS)
